EmailTemplate.name: Contact Us - Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your inquiry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We received your inquiry!
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thank you for your interest in Pivotal. Your request for more information has been passed onto the team. We will get back to you soon. In the meantime, we invite you to explore our resources <http://www.gopivotal.com/resources>, and to learn about our Pivotal People <http://www.gopivotal.com/pivotal/people> and what inspires them to do extraordinary things.
-The Pivotal Team
Follow Us: Twitter <http://twitter.com/gopivotal> | LinkedIn <http://linkedin.com/company/gopivotal> | Facebook <http://www.facebook.com/gopivotal>
